projects.title: Shariful Haque Portfolio
projects.description: A full-stack e-commerce solution featuring user authentication, product management, shopping cart, payment integration, and admin dashboard. Built with modern technologies for optimal performance and user experience.

projects.title: Task Management System
projects.description: A collaborative project management tool with real-time updates, team collaboration features, task assignment, progress tracking, and deadline management. Perfect for remote teams and project coordination.

projects.title: Social Media Dashboard
projects.description: A comprehensive social media management platform that allows users to schedule posts, analyze engagement metrics, manage multiple accounts, and track social media performance across different platforms.

projects.title: Weather Forecast App
projects.description: A responsive weather application providing real-time weather data, 7-day forecasts, weather maps, and location-based services. Features beautiful UI with animated weather icons and detailed meteorological information.

projects.title: Blog Management System
projects.description: A modern blogging platform with rich text editor, comment system, user authentication, SEO optimization, and content management features. Supports markdown and media uploads with Cloudinary integration.

projects.title: Portfolio Website
projects.description: A responsive personal portfolio website showcasing projects, skills, and professional experience. Features smooth animations, dark/light mode toggle, and contact form with email integration.
